title: LIVESTREAM: Kyle Rittenhouse Trial Closing Arguments!
description:
Closing arguments of the Kyle Rittenhouse trial start today. The media have already shown they won’t report the FACTS of the trial, so we’re doing it for them. #KyleRittenhouse #RittenhouseTrial #Kenosha
